price: Moo Sila isatu isa (Qur’aana) uume jedhu?” lakkii, isaan hin amanan.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna taqawwalahu bal lā yu'minūna
